item.title: Thousands Protest in NYC During Netanyahu’s U.N. Speech.

item.title: Digital IDs Are Being Introduced in the UK. Here’s How They’re Expected to Work.
item.description: The government said the new system would help to curb illegal migration, but opponents said it would infringe on citizens’ privacy.
